page.title: 04Court Farm continued.
page.content: {Crops continued:}Wheat is sold to wheat merchants and is milled and used to produce bread. {Livestock:}The farm has 130 cattle ({ {Friesian variety}).70 are used for milking.The remaining 60 are "followers";young calves and heifers. {Milk production:}The farm has an output of {6,400 litres of milk per {cow per year.}The milk is collected daily by a milk tanker lorry from the Milk Marketing Board. {Problems and future developments:} Farming in countries of the developed world is facing a crisis of over-production.There are surpluses in Europe (counties belonging to the European Economic Community)of milk,butter,grain and beef.As a result of the overproduction of milk,Fred Knight has had to reduce his milk yield by 11 per cent since 1983.
